verbs.description: j c penney jcp [V: surges] j c [ARG2: penney company] inc jcp was a big mover last session as the company saw its shares rise nearly 7 on the day the move came on solid volume too with far more shares changing hands than in a normal session this reverses the recent trend for the company as the stock is now down 3 3 in the past one - month time frame the move came after the company extended its partnership with synchrony financial the company has seen six negative regional department stores j c penney jcp kohl corporation kss j c penney marijuana synchrony financial j c penney company inc james cash penney kohls corporation kss
